commenter_a: We had a similar issue at a university I worked at years ago. The guy was just a creepy freak but he cried "academic freedom" and got away with showing porn in a music class and "relating it to music". Oddly enough, once he FINALLY retired, the class was discontinued as it had no value. There are times academic freedom goes too far and yet that is the basic premise of any university and with tenured faculty your hands are tied if they "justify" it.
